page.title: 15 MY HOUSE
page.content:
by Jody Statham.
My house is in Westbury Road Wiltshire My brother, sister and Mum and Dad live in the house too. My house has nine rooms. We all have a bedroom of our own. Downstairs there is a lounge, a kitchen and a spare room. My Mum uses the spare room for sewing and my Dad uses it for his train set. There is a downstairs toilet too. My bedroom is above the lounge. My Gran lives in our garden in a caravan. In our garden we find a lot of horseshoes; this is because there used to be a path there which led to the old glove factory.
